thread.title: BARBARA C BERNARD
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by BARBARA C BERNARD

author: BARBARA C BERNARD
title: BARBARA C BERNARD
text: I am soon to be 90 years old and the one hardship for me this freezing cold winter is getting out to shop, consequently ordering from catalogs is a solution. You had several things I needed and although your prices are a higher than from local stores, the convenience of having my needs delivered to my door makes up for it. Your products are as expected and my only suggestion is if you would like my business during spring, summer and autumn you consider lowering your prices.
